titles.title: To extend and modify the temporary reduction of duty on DEMBB.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: 4/23/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide temporarily a duty on DEMBB.
